remarks: The isomorphism H for a lattice ` K ` is order-preserving in the region under co-atom ` W ` .  (Contributed by NM, 6-Mar-2014.)
statement:
dihord3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dihord3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dihord3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dihord3.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dihord3 $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( X e. B /\ X .<_ W ) /\ ( Y e. B /\ Y .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( I ` X ) C_ ( I ` Y ) <-> X .<_ Y ) ) $.
